name: Goats in the Grotto
description:
A lonesome Shepard forced by the hand of an overly greedy government, must embark on a journey to the deep dark regions of the underworld. Aided only by his faithful herd of goats.

Together they must survive the vicious demonic minions of hell.

Blood will be shed. Friends will be lost. Taxes will go unpaid. 

Welcome to Goats in the Grotto.

Created by Jacob and Nick
